scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run build && npm version patch
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm run build && npm version minor
scripts.release:major: npm test && npm run build && npm version major
scripts.test: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require tests/mocha.setup.js tests/*.spec.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha --watch --compilers js:babel-core/register --require tests/mocha.setup.js tests/**/*.spec.js
